title: (x) Black italic sans in U.S. Honda Fit car commercials - Prosper {Angel}
content:
These are the commercials that end with the tagline “The Fit is Go!” and a sort of retro look to them.

[http://adweek.blogs.com/photos/uncategorized/supertailaction.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410040447/http:/adweek.blogs.com/photos/uncategorized/supertailaction.jpg)
